string-array.name: subm
string-array.item: I dream of a better tomorrow, where chickens can cross the road and not be questioned about their motives. \n-( Kate Hoffman )
I changed all my passwords to \'incorrect\'. So my computer just tells me when I forgot. \n-( Abel Burton )
Anytime a bird poops on one of my windows, I eat a whole plate of scrambled egg on my patio. Just to show them what I\'m capable of. Take that birds \n-( Jimmie Patterson )
One time at the beach this guy was swimming in the ocean yelling Help! Shark! Help!. I just laughed, I knew that shark wasn\'t going to help them. \n-( Rahul Saxena )
Procrastinator? No, I just wait until the last second to do my work because I will be older, therefore wiser. \n-( Shalini Chattarak )
On a scale of Voldemort to Pinocchio, how Nosy are you? \n-( Kanwal Pavagi )
I do 5 sit-ups every morning. May not sound like much, but there is only so many times you can hit the snooze button \n-( Neha Ajagavakar )
I wonder if tap dancers walk into a room, look at the floor and think. I\'d so tap that. \n-( Rati Munshi )
I feel like getting something done today, so I\'m just going to sit here until the feeling passes. \n-( Kanak Pande )
I was complimented on my driving. Someone left a note on my windshield that said, Parking Fine. \n-( Ujali Chopade )
Why do banks lock their pens to the desk? If I\'m trusting you with my money, don\'t you think you can trust me with a pen? \n-( Harriet Todd )
I was planning to do something today, but I haven\'t finished doing nothing from yesterday. \n-( Elsie Lynch )
